parameters.description: Your Tonder API Key. You can recover it on Tonder's dashboard.
parameters.name: api_key

pk.description: The primary key or identifier for the business.

categories.description: An array of categories associated with the business.

pk.description: The primary key or identifier for the category.

web.description: The website URL for the business.

logo.description: The URL of the business's logo.

full_logo_url.description: The URL of the business's full logo.

background_color.description: The background color associated with the business.

primary_color.description: The primary color associated with the business.

checkout_mode.description: A boolean indicating whether the business has a checkout mode.

textCheckoutColor.description: The text color for the checkout.

checkout_logo.description: The URL of the checkout logo.

openpay_keys.description: Contains OpenPay keys for the business.

merchant_id.description: The merchant ID associated with OpenPay.

public_key.description: The public key associated with OpenPay.

fintoc_keys.description: Contains Fintoc keys for the business.

public_key.description: The public key associated with Fintoc.

reference.description: A reference number associated with the business.

is_installments_available.description: A boolean indicating whether installments are available.

id.description: The newly created client's unique identifier.

email.description: The newly created client's email address.

auth_token.description: The authorization token for the client.

business.description: Your Tonder API Key. You can retrieve it from the dashboard.

billing_address_id.description: The identifier for the billing address.

shipping_address_id.description: The identifier for the shipping address.

amount.description: The total monetary value of the transaction.

status.description: A code indicating the status of the transaction.

reference.description: A unique identifier or reference number associated with the transaction.

is_oneclick.description: A boolean value indicating whether the transaction involves a one-click purchase.

items.description: An array containing details about the items included in the transaction.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item added to the cart.

price_unit.description: The unit price of the item.

discount.description: The discount applied to the item.

taxes.description: The taxes associated with the item.

product_reference.description: A reference number or identifier for the product.

name.description: The name or title of the product.

amount_total.description: The total monetary value of this specific cart item.

id.description: An identifier associated with the order.

created.description: The timestamp indicating the creation date and time of the order.

amount.description: The total monetary value of the order.

payment_method.description: The payment method used in the order.

reference.description: A unique identifier or reference number associated with the order.

is_oneclick.description: A boolean value indicating whether the order involves a one-click purchase.

items.description: An array containing details about the items included in the order.

description.description: A description of the item in the order.

product_reference.description: A reference number or identifier for the product in the order.

quantity.description: The quantity of the item in the order.

price_unit.description: The unit price of the item in the order.

discount.description: The discount applied to the item in the order.

taxes.description: The taxes associated with the item in the order.

amount_total.description: The total monetary value of the specific item in the order.

billing_address.description: The billing address information in the order.

shipping_address.description: The shipping address information in the order.

email.description: The email address of the client.

name.description: The full name of the client.

first_name.description: The first name of the client.

last_name.description: The last name of the client.

date_birth.description: Date of birth of the client.

terms.description: A boolean indicating whether the client has agreed to terms.

amount.description: The total monetary value associated with the order.

date.description: The timestamp representing the date and time of the order.

order.description: The unique identifier number for the order.

pk.description: The primary key or identifier associated with the payment.

order.description: The unique identifier number associated with the order.

amount.description: The total monetary value of the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

date.description: The timestamp indicating the date and time the payment was created.

paid_date.description: The timestamp indicating the date and time the order was paid, or null if not paid.

shipping_address.description: Details of the shipping address in the order.

street.description: The street address in the shipping information.

number.description: The house or building number in the shipping information.

suburb.description: The suburb or district in the shipping information.

name.description: The name of the city in the shipping information.

city.description: The city information in the shipping details.

name.description: The name of the state or region in the shipping information.
The name of the country in the shipping information.

country.description: The country information in the shipping details.

state.description: The state information in the shipping details.

zip_code.description: The ZIP code or postal code in the shipping information.

shipping_address_id.description: The identifier associated with the shipping address in the order.

billing_address.description: Details of the billing address in the order.

street.description: The street address in the billing information.

number.description: The house or building number in the billing information.

suburb.description: The suburb or district in the billing information.

name.description: The name of the city in the billing information.

city.description: The city information in the billing details.

name.description: The name of the state or region in the billing information.
The name of the country in the billing information.

country.description: The country information in the billing details.

state.description: The state information in the billing details.

zip_code.description: The ZIP code or postal code in the billing information.

billing_address_id.description: The identifier associated with the billing address in the order.

client.description: The identifier or reference associated with the client or customer.

customer_order_reference.description: The customer's reference or identifier associated with the order.

card.description: Contains information related to the payment card used in the transaction.

cvv.description: The Card Verification Value (CVV) associated with the card.

skyflow_id.description: The unique identifier associated with the card in Skyflow's secure vault.

expiration_year.description: The expiration year of the card.

expiration_month.description: The expiration month of the card.

name.description: The first name of the client.

last_name.description: The last name of the client.

email_client.description: The email address of the client.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the client.

return_url.description: The URL to which the user will be redirected after completing the transaction.

quantity_product.description: The quantity of the product in the transaction.

id_ship.description: The identifier for the shipping information.

instance_id_ship.description: The instance identifier for the shipping information.

amount.description: The total monetary value of the transaction.

title_ship.description: The title or type of shipping.

device_session_id.description: The identifier for the device session.

token_id.description: A token identifier associated with the transaction.

order_id.description: An identifier or reference number for the order.

status.description: The HTTP status code indicating the success or failure of the response.

message.description: A message providing additional information about the success or failure of the response.

psp_response.description: The response from the payment service provider (PSP) containing detailed information about the payment transaction.

id.description: A unique identifier for the payment transaction within the payment service provider (PSP) system.

object.description: The type of object, representing the nature of the transaction (e.g., 'charge' for a payment charge).

amount.description: The total amount of the transaction, expressed in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents or pence).

amount_captured.description: The amount that has been captured or collected from the customer as part of the transaction.

amount_refunded.description: The amount that has been refunded to the customer as part of the transaction.

application.description: The identifier of the application associated with the transaction, if applicable.

application_fee.description: The application fee, if any, applied to the transaction.

application_fee_amount.description: The amount of the application fee, if any, applied to the transaction.

balance_transaction.description: The identifier of the balance transaction associated with the payment charge.

city.description: The city associated with the billing address.

country.description: The country associated with the billing address.

line1.description: The first line of the billing address.

line2.description: The second line of the billing address.

postal_code.description: The postal code associated with the billing address.

state.description: The state or region associated with the billing address.

address.description: Object containing details about the address in the billing details.

email.description: The email address associated with the billing details.

name.description: The name associated with the billing details.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the billing details.

billing_details.description: Object containing details about the billing information.

calculated_statement_descriptor.description: The calculated statement descriptor associated with the transaction.

captured.description: Indicates whether the payment has been captured (true) or not (false).

created.description: The timestamp representing the creation date and time of the transaction.

currency.description: The currency code associated with the transaction.

customer.description: The identifier of the customer associated with the transaction.

description.description: A description or additional information about the transaction.

destination.description: The destination of the transaction, if applicable.

dispute.description: The identifier of any dispute associated with the transaction, if applicable.

disputed.description: Indicates whether the transaction is disputed (true) or not (false).

failure_balance_transaction.description: The identifier of the balance transaction in case of failure, if applicable.

failure_code.description: The code associated with the failure, if applicable.

failure_message.description: A message providing details about the failure, if applicable.

fraud_details.description: Details about any fraud associated with the transaction, if applicable.

invoice.description: The identifier of the invoice associated with the transaction, if applicable.

livemode.description: Indicates whether the transaction was created in live mode (true) or test mode (false).

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the transaction.

on_behalf_of.description: The identifier of the account on behalf of which the transaction is performed, if applicable.

order.description: The identifier of the order associated with the transaction, if applicable.

outcome.description: Details about the outcome of the payment transaction.

network_status.description: The network status of the payment, indicating whether it was approved by the payment network.

reason.description: The reason for the outcome, if available. For example, it might contain details if the payment was declined.

risk_level.description: The risk level associated with the payment, indicating the perceived risk of the transaction.

risk_score.description: The numerical risk score assigned to the payment transaction, providing a quantitative measure of risk.

seller_message.description: A message for the seller providing information about the outcome of the payment, typically for display purposes.

type.description: The type of outcome, indicating the result of the payment authorization process (e.g., 'authorized', 'manual_review', 'issuer_declined').

paid.description: A boolean indicating whether the payment has been successfully paid.

payment_intent.description: The unique identifier of the payment intent associated with this payment transaction. This is relevant for payments using payment methods that involve a two-step confirmation process.

payment_method.description: The unique identifier of the payment method used for this transaction, such as a credit card or debit card.

payment_method_details.description: Details about the payment method used for the transaction, including card details and type.

amount_authorized.description: The amount authorized on the card, represented as an integer value.

brand.description: The brand or type of the card used for the payment (e.g., Visa, MasterCard).

address_line1_check.description: The result of the address line 1 check, indicating if it matches the card's billing address.

address_postal_code_check.description: The result of the postal code check, indicating if it matches the card's billing postal code.

cvc_check.description: The result of the card security code (CVC) check.

checks.description: Various checks performed on the card details for validation purposes.

country.description: The country where the card was issued.

exp_month.description: The expiration month of the card.

exp_year.description: The expiration year of the card.

status.description: The status of extended authorization, indicating if it is enabled or disabled.

fingerprint.description: A unique identifier (fingerprint) for the card.

funding.description: The funding source of the card, such as 'credit'.

status.description: The status of incremental authorization, indicating if it is available or unavailable.

installments.description: The number of installments for the payment, if applicable.

last4.description: The last four digits of the card number.

mandate.description: The mandate associated with the payment, if applicable.

status.description: The status of multicapture, indicating if it is available or unavailable.

network.description: The card network, such as Visa.

used.description: A boolean indicating whether the network token has been used.

network_token.description: Information about the usage status of the network token.

maximum_amount_capturable.description: The maximum amount that can be captured for the payment.

status.description: The status of overcapture, indicating if it is available or unavailable.

three_d_secure.description: The status of 3D Secure authentication, if applicable.

wallet.description: The type of wallet used for the payment, if applicable.

card.description: Details about the card used for the payment, including brand, checks, country, expiration, and more.

type.description: The type of payment method, such as 'card'.

radar_options.description: Options related to Stripe Radar, which provides advanced fraud protection.

receipt_email.description: The email address to which the receipt for the transaction was sent, or null if no receipt was sent.

receipt_number.description: The receipt number associated with the transaction, or null if no receipt number is available.

receipt_url.description: The URL to view the receipt for the payment, or null if no receipt is available.

refunded.description: A boolean indicating whether the payment has been refunded.

review.description: The status of the payment review, or null if no review is in progress.

street.description: The street address for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.

number.description: The street number for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.

suburb.description: The suburb or neighborhood for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.

name.description: The name of the city for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.
The name of the state for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.
The name of the country for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.

zip_code.description: The ZIP code for shipping. If not applicable, set to 'N/a'.

shipping.description: Information about the shipping address associated with the transaction.

source.description: The ID of the payment source. If not applicable or available, set to null.

source_transfer.description: The ID of the transfer made from the payment source. If not applicable or available, set to null.

statement_descriptor.description: A custom statement descriptor for the payment. If not applicable or available, set to null.

statement_descriptor_suffix.description: A custom statement descriptor suffix for the payment. If not applicable or available, set to null.

status.description: The status of the payment transaction, e.g., 'succeeded'.

transfer_data.description: Information about the transfer associated with the payment. If not applicable or available, set to null.

transfer_group.description: The ID of the transfer group. If not applicable or available, set to null.

transaction_status.description: The status of the transaction, e.g., 'Success'.

transaction_id.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

payment_id.description: The unique identifier for the payment associated with the transaction.

provider.description: The payment provider used for the transaction, e.g., 'stripe'.

next_action.description: Details about the next action required for the transaction. If not applicable, an empty object is provided.

name.description: The name of the action, e.g., 'verify_transaction_status'.

url.description: The URL endpoint for the action.

method.description: The HTTP method for the action, e.g., 'GET'.

items.description: An array of actions associated with the transaction.

actions.description: An array of actions that can be performed for the transaction, each represented by an object with 'name', 'url', and 'method' properties.
